title: Trying to Reconnect on a Mac
body: I can not play because it always appears to me: "Trying to Reconnect" and it's very frustrating to see it again and again every time I open my league and I have a really good connection...

replies.body: This bug has been around for months now...still has not been fixed.

I have the same problem for 4 weeks now. Checked the ports in my router (forwarding) and my connection is fine. Used the hex tech repair tool but nothing helped me so far. if I reinstall it, it works for once. Next time its reconnect issue again...

Hey is this on EU or the PBE?  Is it while reconnecting to a game or another section of the client?  I've seen a few mac reports today so I'm trying to get some more info.

In the meantime, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well to help rule out some common case situations.

It happens when I enter in the client, in the Euw. I put the name, the password and do the login. After that there is the message "trying to reconnect". I must close the client at least 10 times or the problem doesn't disappear. 
Maybe after one hour of closing the app finally I can play, but it's soooo frustrating. 
Please make something about this.
